meaningMnemonic: A <radical>wing</radical>ed <radical>cow</radical> is flying in the air. What a strange <kanji>thing</kanji>! You’ve heard of flying pigs before, but cows? This is a new and strange thing indeed! Cows with wings! What a silly thing to imagine.
readingMnemonic: You want a <kanji>thing</kanji> to help you fly with the cow so you put on your flying <reading>boots</reading> (ぶつ). Your flying boots are a pretty strange thing in themselves, but they're the only way you can keep up.
